title: The Detective Boys and the Ghost Mansion

infobox.Title:: The Detective Boys and the Ghost Mansion
infobox.Japanese title:: 探偵団と幽霊館  (Tanteidan to Yuurei Yakata)
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (Supervisors)  Yui Ushinohama, Chie Morishita (asst.), and Aya Sasaki (asst.)
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Kyoko Yoshimi (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Hirofumi Nojima as Hideto Amemiya  Ryusuke Obayashi as Nobuteru Otaguro  Yoko Osawa as Chieko Otaguro  Chika Sakamoto as Hana Yoshimoto  Naomi Kusumi as Saburo Yoshimoto  Kanji Obana as Manager

sections.Situation: Conan and the Detective Boys were hiking in the forest and were going to visit a lighthouse when the storm bursted. They decided to hide under a the solar panels of a greenhouse and have been spotted by the greenhouse's manager who brought them to the nearby Otaguro mansion. They were welcomed by Saburo and Yoshimoto, the maid. They were then informed about the head of the family, Otaguro, who have had early encounters of a ghost that appeared like a yellow glowing light. Just after, the mysterious glowing light in question appeared and frightened the Detective Boys and it was interrupted by the arrival of Hideto Amemiya who led them visit his lab and explained them the past accident of the late Mrs. Otaguro.
